articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful at Asian Taekwon-Do Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful at Asian Taekwon-Do Championships
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK proved successful at the 5th Asian Taekwon-Do Championships.
					 The championships brought together more than 200 male and female players from 13 countries and regions including the DPRK, Mongolia, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan and the Far East of Russia. 
					
					 The DPRK players bagged 24 gold, four silver and nine bronze medals, thus placing first in the countries standings. 
					
					 They came first in adult men's and women's team standings, men's and women's team pattern competitions and women's team sparring.
					
					 Gold medalists in adult level include Ri Hyon and Jang In Myong in the second and the third grade of men's individual pattern competitions, Yun Chung Nam in the first grade of men's individual pattern competitions and 64 kg category sparring, Ri Myong Jin in the fourth grade of men's individual pattern competitions, individual demonstration show and 71 kg category sparring, Ri Kyong Gum in the third grade of women's individual pattern competitions, Ri Su Ryon and Sin Jong Hwa in 63 kg and 69 kg category sparring, Hwang Hyang Mi in exhibition for special skill and 45 kg category sparring, Im Hyon Sun in the second grade of women's individual pattern competitions and 51 kg category sparring and O Kum Ju in the fourth grade of women's individual pattern competitions and 75 kg category sparring. 
					
					 Kim Hyang Sim took the first in the junior third grade of women's individual pattern competitions, 64 kg category sparring and exhibition for special skill.

articles.title: DPRK Defeats Nigeria Again
articles.content:
DPRK Defeats Nigeria Again
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The second female football match between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and Nigeria took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Wednesday with the approach of the 2010 Asian Women's Football Championship.
					 The DPRK team defeated the Nigerian team 3:0. 
					
					 Earlier, the host team won the first match held on May 2 with Ri Ye Gyong, No. 9, getting a goal some 14 minutes after the beginning of the first half.
					
					 The DPRK belongs to Group A in the Asian Cup together with Thailand, Myanmar and Japan.

articles.title: Ruined Kiln Belonging to Neolithic Era Unearthed
articles.content:
Ruined Kiln Belonging to Neolithic Era Unearthed
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Korean archeologists have discovered a ruined kiln dating back to the Neolithic era in Richon-ri, Sungho County, North Hwanghae Province.
					 A trace of fire, 125-145 centimeters in diameter, was found out in the center of the oval-shaped kiln site. 
					
					 Ten pieces of earthenware were also excavated in the site. In view of the shape and size of the ruined kiln and the measurement of the broken earthenware, the remains are estimated to be round 6,500 years old, the middle of the Neolithic era.
					
					  The discovery of the remains, believed to be the oldest kiln site among those found out in the country, on the basin of the River Taedong is of weighty significance in ascertaining the historical position of Pyongyang as a birthplace of human culture and a center of cultural development.

articles.title: Single-hearted Unity of Korean People Has Long History
articles.content:
Single-hearted Unity of Korean People Has Long History
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- It is closely related to the tradition of great national unity, provided by President Kim Il Sung, that the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is demonstrating its invincible might augmented by its single hearted unity.
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland (ARF) in May Juche 25 (1936) as an anti-Japanese national united front involving broad sections of patriotic forces to considerably strengthen the domestic force of the revolution and bring about a fresh upsurge in the Korean revolution.
					
					 Since the foundation of the ARF the unity of the revolutionary ranks has been consolidated with the leader as its core and on the basis of monolithic ideology and tremendous achievements made in accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					
					 In line with the President's idea of forming a united front, the Workers' Party of Korea developed into a mass party and the Korean people won the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953) and successfully carried out two stages of the complicated social revolution.
					
					 The validity and vitality of his idea of great national unity have been fully manifested in the effort for reunifying the country and attaining the prosperity of the nation.
					
					The tradition of the unity has been carried forward successfully by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He, under the banner of Songun politics, has achieved the unity of the whole Party, entire army and all the people in ideology and working manner based on the revolutionary soldier spirit.  It is thanks to his outstanding and seasoned leadership that the Korean people have registered signal successes in the building of a thriving nation in spite of vicious and persistent challenges of the imperialists.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates a signed article to the 19th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" on May 5, Juche 80 (1991).
					 He clarified in the work that socialism in the DPRK is socialism centered on the popular masses and guided by the Juche idea, it is the best and vital socialism chosen by the Korean people themselves and built by their own efforts suited to the actual conditions of the DPRK and it is invincible socialism based on the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses.
					
					 It is the unshakable faith enshrined in the minds of the servicepersons and the people of the DPRK that Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is the cradle of the people firmly guaranteeing their ideal and happiness and eternal victory and prosperity are in store for them when they defend it, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The invincibility of Korean-style socialism lies in the fact that it regards the Juche idea, the Songun idea as its ideological basis, the leader, the army and the people are single-mindedly united and all the fields are making steady progress as a high degree of  revolutionary enthusiasm and creative ingenuity of the popular masses serve as a driving force.
					
					 The whole society is pervaded with the Juche idea, the Songun idea, the revolutionary soldier spirit and the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance are running high across the country and all the people are guided by the Juche idea in their practical actions.
					
					 The single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and the people centered on the headquarters of the revolution serves as a powerful engine guaranteeing the victorious advance of Korean-style socialism. 
					
					 A high-pitched drive for effecting collective innovations is now under way in all sectors building a great prosperous and powerful nation. 
					
					 Collectivism represents the noble ideological and moral traits of the army and the people and the source of strength giving full play to popular heroism in socialist construction.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Blocking Reunification Event
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Blocking Reunification Event
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Members of various civic and public organizations in south Korea in a press interview on May 1 denounced the puppet authorities for blocking the May Day reunification event of workers in the north and the south.
					 Kim Yong Hun, chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions, said that the responsibility for torpedoing the event commemorating the 120th May Day for implementing the June 15 joint declaration entirely rests with the present "government". 
					
					 He expressed irrepressible indignation at the authorities who stood in the way of the exchange for reunification, persistently taking a negative approach towards the above-said event. 
					
					 Ri Kyong Won, secretary general of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, noted that the projected event could not be held due to the present authorities' policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Ri Kang Sil, permanent co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, said the "government" mercilessly dampened the desire of the workers to make a contribution to improving the inter-Korean relations, declaring that the organization would take the lead in the struggle for reunification with redoubled efforts in the future.  
					
					 Meanwhile, officials concerned with the Confederation of Trade Unions under the Labor Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration noted in an article posted on the Internet homepage on April 30 that they would overcome the present difficulties and plan a more dynamic reunification movement and strive to implement it.

articles.title: Authorities' Fascist Suppression Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Fascist Suppression Censured in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea released a statement on April 30 denouncing the puppet authorities' desperate moves to intensify the crackdown upon the progressive forces.
					 The statement charged that the authorities drastically beefed up the repressive forces in the run-up to the "election to the local self-governing bodies" and, on this basis, are now intensifying the fascist crackdown than ever before while getting frantic with the operations to arrest and investigate a great many reunification champions, youth and students and Internet subscribers and search and confiscate their belongings. 
					
					 This is little short of self-exposing that the authorities are in their dying breath, thrown into a dilemma, it noted.
					
					 The public is filled with a will to judge the present regime without fail, the statement said, chiding the authorities for employing the same method as the successive dictators did to tide over their crisis.
					
					 It urged the authorities not to forget the miserable end the Syngman Rhee dictatorial regime met while seeking to stay in power through the suppression under the pretext of "security," etc. 
					
					 They should bear deep in mind that their attempt to calm down the angry public with deception, fraud and threat will only invite stronger resistance of the people, warned the statement.

articles.title: Stronger Unity of Workers Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stronger Unity of Workers Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on May 1, May Day.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the south Korean workers have fought in the van of the struggle for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 It called upon the workers to turn out in a courageous struggle for breaking the chains of capital as well as the wire entanglements splitting the nation into two and the chains of the neo-liberal policy. 
					
					 Underscoring the need for all the workers to further strengthen their unity in order to put an end to the exploitation by capital and the colonial rule, it declared that the organization would positively support the workers who devote themselves, fully aware of their historic mission, and take the lead in the solidarity actions.

articles.title: Cuba-DPRK Friendly Gathering Held
articles.content:
Cuba-DPRK Friendly Gathering Held
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A Cuba-DPRK friendly gathering took place in Havana on April 29.
					Displayed in the venue were photos showing immortal Songun leadership exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The gathering was attended by officials of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Agro-stock Co-op Farm Named after "Heroes of Yaguajay" and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and his embassy officials.
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban committee, said at the gathering that President Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens to liberate Korea usurped by the Japanese imperialists and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and led the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean People's Army and the DPRK, led the three-year Fatherland Liberation War fought against the U.S. imperialists and their stooges to victory and wisely steered the work for the postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction and dedicated all his life to the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 He, who devoted all his life to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence, is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and all other progressive people of the world.
					
					 The speaker expressed the will to strive to boost the friendship and unity between the two peoples this significant year marking the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries, the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the WPK and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was published in booklet by the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela on April 23.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively indicates the ways for achieving the great unity of the nation such as the matter of founding a unified state through the unity of the whole nation and achieving unity based on the love for the nation and the spirit of national independence, the matter of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests, ending all political strife escalating the division and confrontation between fellow countrymen and building confidence and achieving unity between the north and the south and the matter of joining hands on the road for the country's reunification, not rejecting each other because of differing ideology and ism.

articles.title: Army Day of DPRK Marked in Austria
articles.content:
Army Day of DPRK Marked in Austria
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria, issued a bulletin on April 28 on the occasion of the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Carried in the bulletin were a photo of Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA, inspecting a KPA unit and an article titled "The KPA, the defender of the sovereignty of the DPRK".
					
					 The bulletin in the article noted that the KPA founded by President Kim Il Sung won brilliant victories in two revolutionary wars and has firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country. 
					
					Saying that the KPA has played a decisive role in carrying out the Songun politics pursued by 
						Kim Jong Il, it stressed that under his leadership the KPA has grown to be an invincible army strong enough to smash any aggression move of the imperialists at one stroke.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe medalla conmemorativa del gobierno ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe medalla conmemorativa del gobierno ruso
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il recibio la medalla conmemorativa del 65o Aniversario de la Victoria en la Gran Guerra de la Patria que le dirigiera el gobierno de la Federacion Rusa.
					La ceremonia de entrega de dicha medalla tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la embajada rusa en Corea.
					
					A la ocasion asistieron el canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun, el subdirector del Instituto de Historia del Partido del CC del PTC Ri Kwang, y otros funcionarios coreanos, el embajador Valery Sukhinin y otros miembros de la embajada.
					
					El embajador ruso entrego al canciller coreano la citada medalla y el certificado.

articles.title: Taekwondoistas coreanos sobresalen en V Campeonato Asiatico
articles.content:
Taekwondoistas coreanos sobresalen en V Campeonato Asiatico
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ATCC) -- En el V Campeonato Asiatico de Taekwondo, los jugadores coreanos ocuparon el primer lugar en la clasificacion general por paises con 24 medallas de oro, 4 de plata y 9 de bronce.
					 En el presente certamen participaron mas de 200 taekwondoistas de ambos sexos procedentes de los 13 paises y regiones como Corea, Mongolia, Uzbekistan, Tadjikistan y el Lejano Oriente de Rusia.
					
					  Los coreanos se clasificaron primeros en la clasificacion general colectiva de ambos sexos, el pattern colectivo de ambos sexos y el parrins colectivo femenino, de la categoria de adultos.
					
					  En dicha categoria, Ri Hyon y Jang In Myong ganaron medallas de oro en el pattern del segundo y tercer niveles individual (m); Yun Chung Nam, en el pattern del primer nivel y el parrins individuales (m) de categoria de 64㎏ y Ri Myong Jin, en el pattern del cuarto nivel, el power y el parrins individuales (m) de categoria de 71㎏, respectivamente.
					
					  Tambien, Ri Kyong Gum la recibio en el pattern individual (f) del tercer nivel; Ri Su Ryon y Sin Jong Hwa, en el parrins individual de categoria de 63㎏ y de 69㎏; Hwang Hyang Mi, en la tecnica especial individual y el parrins de categoria de 45㎏; Im Hyon Sun, en el pattern individual del segundo nivel y el parrins de categoria de 51㎏ y O Kum Ju, en el pattern del cuarto nivel y el parrins individuales (f) de categoria de 75㎏, respectivamente.
					
					  Ademas, en la division de juniores Kim Hyang Sim se destaco en el pattern del tercer nivel, el parrins de categoria de 64㎏ y la tecnica especial individuales (f).

articles.title: Descubiertas en Corea ruinas de horno de la edad neolitica
articles.content:
Descubiertas en Corea ruinas de horno de la edad neolitica
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ATCC) -- Recientemente, los arqueologos coreanos descubrieron en la comuna de Richon del distrito de Sungho de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte las ruinas de un horno de la era neolitica donde se habian hecho las vasijas de barro.
					En el centro de las ruinas en forma eliptica se hallaba un fogon cuyo perimetro es de 125-145 centimetros.
					
					En sus alrededores fueron encontradas 10 vasijas de barro calcinadas en aquel entonces.
					
					Segun el resultado de investigacion de la forma estructural, tamano y anejamiento de las ruinas, se deduce que ellas pertenecen al periodo medio de la edad neolitica, especificamente, de hace 6 mil 500 anos mas o menos.
					
					Esto comprueba que ellas son las mas anejas entre los vestigios del mismo tipo descubiertos hasta la fecha en el pais.
					
					El hallazgo de esas ruinas mundialmente raras en la cuenca del rio Taedong consolida de manera cientifica la posicion historica de Pyongyang como cuna de civilizacion de la humanidad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun subraya la invencibilidad de socialismo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun subraya la invencibilidad de socialismo
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico el dia 5 el articulo individual dedicado al 19o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Nuestro socialismo centrado en las masas populares es invencible", publicada el 5 de mayo del 80 (1991) de la Era Juche.
					En la obra, el Dirigente senalo que el socialismo coreano es el centrado en las masas populares que materializa la idea Juche, el mas ventajoso y vital que fue optado por el mismo pueblo coreano y construido con las fuerzas propias conforme a la situacion del pais y el indestructible donde estan unidos monoliticamente el lider, el partido y las masas, comienza el articulista y continua:
					
					El socialismo al estilo coreano es la cuna de vida que garantiza firmemente el ideal y la felicidad del pueblo. Defender el socialismo significa la eterna victoria y prosperidad, he aqui la invariable conviccion arraigada en el corazon del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					La invencibilidad del socialismo coreano parte de que el dirigente, el ejercito y el pueblo estan unidos monoliticamente teniendo como su base ideologica la idea Juche, la del Songun, y todos los sectores se desarrollan incesantemente empujados por el gran entusiasmo revolucionario y las fuerzas creativas de las masas populares.
					
					Toda la sociedad esta unificada con la idea Juche, la del Songun, y se palpitan en todo el pais el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de autoconfianza. Y todo el pueblo esta poniendo en practica la idea Juche.
					
					Hoy dia, la unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y el pueblo en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion sirve de poderosa fuerza motriz que asegura el avance victorioso del socialismo coreano.
					
					Ahora, se levanta en todos los sectores de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera la oleada de innovacion colectiva. El colectivismo es el noble rasgo ideo-espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y la fuente del heroismo masivo que se manifiesta en la construccion socialista.
